price: Akasema: Je! Ijapo kuwa nitakuletea kitu cha kubainisha wazi?
footnotes: Musa akasema kwa upole kwa kutumai asaa akaamini: Utanitia gerezani hata nikikuletea ushahidi mkubwa wa ukweli wa haya niyasemayo?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
